body_html: The model_to_estimator merely copies the model (which shouldn't matter too much in your case as you only have less than 1M parameters), and allocating so much memory doesn't seem right but that process shouldn't happen during the conversion -- that's why I'm asking if pure estimator implementation can be checked.
body_text: The model_to_estimator merely copies the model (which shouldn't matter too much in your case as you only have less than 1M parameters), and allocating so much memory doesn't seem right but that process shouldn't happen during the conversion -- that's why I'm asking if pure estimator implementation can be checked.
body: The model_to_estimator merely copies the model (which shouldn't matter too much in your case as you only have less than 1M parameters), and allocating so much memory doesn't seem right but that process shouldn't happen during the conversion -- that's why I'm asking if pure estimator implementation can be checked.
